text:
I am trying to modify a workflow such that, if a ticket is created by sending an email to one that is configured as an Inbox for a pipeline, if the sender's domain is not within a defined list, it will move the ticket to a different pipeline or forward the original email to a different address that is associated with a different Inbox/pipeline.

Can anyone shed any light on whether or not this is possible and if it is, provide some info to get me started?
